content: double gingham throw designed by owlays crochet / april 2025 finished size approximately 32 wide x 40 long using 4 medium weight yarn k/6 5mm hook and recommended gauge yardage used solid color 720 yards variegated color 490 yards note this sample was completed with 70 solid row instead of the originally planned 100 stitch placement all stitches are worked through both loops under the front and back loop together for the entire blanket this helps maintain a smooth flat fabric without raised ridges or ribbing color changes cut yarn at the end of each row to avoid gaps start the new yarn with a slip knot pulled through the last loop of the previous row work a few stitches then knot the old and new tails together tightly weave in or hide ends within the final border total row count 1 foundation chain 70 solid double_crochet row 70 variegated slip_stitch + filler double_crochet row 2 variegated border row bottom and top 2 solid single_crochet border row bottom and top = 145 total row pattern notes work all stitches through both loops always cut yarn at the end of each row alternate direction of blanket each row physically turn work do not chain at the beginning of any row maintain 115 stitches across throughout pattern foundation chain variegated color a o chain 115 cut & turn row 1 solid color b o double_crochet into first chain and in next 2 chains skip 1 chain double_crochet in next 3 chain across end with 3 double_crochet o this will give you 29 clusters of 3 double crochets and 28 spokes the filler doubles o cut yarn row 2 variegated color a o turn work join new yarn to last stitch of previous row using the slip knot method o slip_stitch in top of each of the 3 double_crochet yarn over insert hook into the skipped chain space from row 1 the spoke pull up a loop 3 loops on hook yarn over and pull through all 3 ▪ repeat this pattern slip_stitch in next 3 double_crochet filler double_crochet into skipped chain space from row 1 o continue across cut yarn repeat pattern row o alternate repeating row 1 and 2 for a total of 70 solid row and 70 variegated row 140 total row border instructions slip_stitch foundation round variegated color a o do not chain turn work so variegated and solid row alternate direction work slip stitches all the way around the blanket o 2 slip stitches into each double_crochet row end on vertical sides o 1 slip_stitch into each variegated row end o in each corner slip_stitch 2 chain 1 slip_stitch 2 into the same corner space final round solid color b o single_crochet around entire blanket into the slip_stitch round work 3 single_crochet into each corner chain-1 space bind off weave in any visible ends
